title: Bask Aromatherapy Balance Essential Oil
description: Add 8-10 drops to your candle vaporiser with water. Electric devices, use as recommended by manufacturer. Not to be used undiluted on the skin. 10mL This zesty essential oil is an uplifting blend to add to your vaporiser to uplift and refresh your home
cleaned_text: FREE DELIVERY FOR ORDERS OVER $200* Add 8-10 drops to your candle vaporiser with water. Electric devices, use as recommended by manufacturer.
